title: Playboy number one
brief_description: Off-beat comedy, set aboard a cruise ship, revolving around a french teacher (Willie Howard), and his attempt to find a girlfriend. Cast includes Janet Reade, Louis Sorin, Ruth Leavitt, Charles Slattery, Abe Bronson, Joseph De Villard.
